org.agilewiki.jfile.block

Class LTA32Block

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jfile.block.LBlock
      • org.agilewiki.jfile.block.LTBlock
        • org.agilewiki.jfile.block.LTA32Block
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Block

    public class LTA32Block
extends LTBlock
    A block with a length, timestamp and Adler32 checksum in the header.
